message: I find beauty in the overlooked — in rusted pipes, cracked walls, and quiet moments. I don’t chase loudness; I chase meaning. My camera is my journal, capturing stories the city forgets. I believe in small acts of kindness, long walks without a destination, and conversations that go deeper than surface-level. Life isn’t about being seen; it’s about seeing — truly seeing — the world around you. Stay curious. Stay quiet. And don’t be afraid to be yourself, even when no one’s watching.
cn_prompt: 画面中的男士正在对着镜头讲话，镜头固定。
en_prompt: The man in the image is speaking directly to the camera, with a fixed shot.
